data.title: Stopped for the Buffet....
data.text: A few of us had gotten done at Barksdale AFB and want to go for the seafood buffet.  Pretty good dinner, although it seemed a bit better the last time I was here.

data.title: Good buffet.
data.text: We got the senior discount. Food was plentiful and good. Crab legs included as well as tea and soft drinks.

data.title: Great time
data.text: Enjoyed this casino.  Staff members very friendly and you didn't have to wait a long time to get a coke.  The gaming machines offered variety.

data.title: Good Hotel & Casino
data.text: We take off for Margaritaville when the hotel offers us perks, otherwise we stay at other casinos. Great variety of casinos & restaurants for a weekend getaway. Rates are great on the week days, high on the weekends.

data.title: The Best Hotel/Casino in Shreveport!
data.text: The newest property in Shreveport and in my opinion.... the best Hotel/Casino around! We saw a concert here, enjoyed their buffet and gambled. This is also the only hotel that features balconies with nice views of the Red River!

data.title: You can have a great time at this casino.
data.text:
If this casino and hotel are not new then it has been renovated recently. The room was wonderful and clean. 

The casino was very nice and again clean. They provided free soft drinks that you could poor yourself. I'm sure they provided adult beverages to the gamblers. I just wasn't in a drinking mood. The only even slightly negative thing I could say about the casino is that it is surrounded by glass panels. There are only a few egress points and there are at least 2 security people at each opening.  I'm a bit claustrophobic and that bothered me a bit.

data.title: had a great time
data.text: Very nice room. Felt very spacious. I had a wonderful view of the Red River. My family enjoyed one of the best meals we have ever had at Jimmy's Steakhouse. Gym was large and well equipped.  Pool area gorgeous. Attentive staff. Great rates.

data.title: great buffet - lots of food at reasonable price
data.text: Went to the buffet here. Lots of choices at great price. Seafood to steak and deserts galore. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Shreveport and Bossier City.

data.title: Living in paradise!
data.text: I love staying at this hotel! Sheets are always cleaned, friendly people , if you have not stayed there, beds are comfortable, wake up go to the casino, right at your fingertip

data.title: very clean .    great employment works well the its customers.
data.text: I have had nothing but great things to say about Margaritaville Resort Casino. Margaritaville have the best employees.

data.title: Great Visit
data.text: If you are looking for a wonderful place to spend a weekend or possibly an upcoming vacation... I suggest that you consider Margaritaville in Bossier City, Louisiana. The rooms are great, Bass Pro Shops is right next door and there are many shopping and eating locations within easy walking distance. And to make it better, there is always a chance to win it big in the clean and well managed Casino.  This area has lots to offer and many fun things to do

data.title: Good time
data.text: Enjoyed myself wish there was more acknowledgement for birthday guest though other than that great!!

data.title: Our Favorite Place to Stay in Shreveport!
data.text: We love everything about Margaritaville!!  It feels like we were on vacation somewhere else, love the tropical feel and every employee there seem to LOVE their job!  Everyone was friendly and super FUN!!

data.title: Let the fun begin
data.text:
Had a great time the staff are all very friendly and helpful. The casino is a lot of fun it has table games and slots. Clean and safe.. the hotel rooms are very nice. 
Great location too

data.title: slot
data.text: i enjoy the playing of several machine, food, amenities, room, view of the outside, a pleasue of being at this location.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: My favorite casino! I always have a great time when I stay at Margaritaville Resort Casino! Everyone is so friendly and courteous! Love it!

data.title: Nice place!
data.text: This was our first overnight stay at this hotel. Arrived before 6pm as requested and they didn't have the room type we requested. After a short delay we were upgraded to a nicer room. Wonderful view and beautiful room. Despite the casino being tight we decided to stay another night.  Called the front desk and was told we would have to move and to come down at noon. We arrived at noon (with luggage) and were told it would be a while before our room was ready. It took a while to get the room but it was clean and had a decent view. Note that we requested a king non smoking and both rooms assigned had two queens. No biggie!  Neither smelled like.smoke which was great. Ate at Jimmy B's which was wonderful!. My husband had luck in the casino.  Overall we would stay here again.

data.title: No water for shower...prior visit fire alarm went off at 3 am.  Plus smoke smoke and more smoke
data.text: This is a casino and they allow smoking in the casino and in many rooms.  I do not like smoke.  Additionally, my first stay here ended up with the fire alarm going off on my floor in the middle of the night.  The staff acted like it was no big deal.  My next visit I woke up Sunday morning to no water in my room.  Two strikes was enough for me.

data.title: Best Place to stay in Bossier/Shreveport area.
data.text: This hotel and casino is very nice, the rooms are always clean and the beds are the BEST!!.  They are so comfortable.  The staff is always very nice, courteous and eager to help you in anyway possible!

data.title: Birthday celebration
data.text: Weekend getaway to celebrate birthday. Very nice hotel and enjoyed lunchtime buffet. Will come again.
